// src/pages/EventsPage.js
import React from'react';import'./EventsPage.css';import OurEventsTitle from'../assets/OurEventsTitle.png';import eventTemplate1 from'../assets/event_template1.png';import eventTemplate2 from'../assets/event_template2.png';import eventTemplate3 from'../assets/event_template3.png';import eventTemplate4 from'../assets/event_template4.png';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function EventsPage(){const events=[{id:'event-1',image:eventTemplate1,title:"Mobile Development Workshop",description:"Learn the fundamentals of mobile app development."},{id:'event-2',image:eventTemplate2,title:"Peer Mentor Recruitment",description:"Join us as a mentor to guide newcomers!"},{id:'event-3',image:eventTemplate3,title:"Arista Barbecue",description:"Enjoy a fun barbecue event with peers."},{id:'event-4',image:eventTemplate4,title:"Exciting Event",description:"Join us for another exciting event."}];return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"events-page",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:OurEventsTitle,alt:"Our Events",className:"events-title-image"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"events-list",children:events.map(event=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"event-box",id:event.id,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:event.image,alt:event.title,className:"event-image"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"event-info",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{children:event.title}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:event.description})]})]},event.id))})]});}export default EventsPage;
